entry.title: Aren't we all broken ?
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,431Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 6

Summary: Dick is back in town for christmas and an unexpected encounter with Jason would lead into unfolding every emotions he had kept inside. Would Dick finally be able to get along with Jason ? And would Jason be able to let go of his hate for the bats ?
